Hairdresser Wanted for Helin Hair â€“ Join a Passionate and Sustainable Team ğŸŒ¿

Helin Hair is a growing hairdressing chain with soon-to-be five salons, primarily located in North Zealand. We are known for our passionate and well-trained hairdressers who strive to deliver the highest quality in hair care, coloring, cutting, and styling. Sustainability is a core value for us, and we are proud to run salons that are 96% green. â™»ï¸ We actively reduce our environmental footprint by using eco-friendly products, minimizing waste, and prioritizing energy-efficient solutions. We work exclusively with high-quality and sustainable brands such as Goldwell, KMS, Muran, and Kerasilk.

We are now looking for a skilled hairdresser who wants to continue our success and contribute to a greener future while delivering top-quality services to our customers.

ğŸŒ± We offer you:

âœ… A permanent full-time/part-time position
âœ… A creative and sustainable work environment with great freedom to explore your ideas
âœ… Work with the marketâ€™s leading and eco-friendly products: Goldwell, KMS, Muran, and Kerasilk
âœ… Opportunities for ongoing training and participation in courses, including sustainability-focused education
âœ… A strong professional international culture focusing on collaboration, development, and green initiatives
âœ… An attractive salary package and great employee benefits
âœ… Thorough training and introduction to our products and sustainable practices
âœ… A workplace where we actively reduce water and energy consumption and work towards zero waste

ğŸƒ We expect from you:

ğŸŒ Certified hairdresser with a diploma
ğŸŒ Experience in both men's and women's haircuts, coloring, and styling
ğŸŒ A great passion for hair, customer service, and sustainability
ğŸŒ Willingness to develop through further education and stay updated on the latest eco-friendly hairdressing techniques
ğŸŒ Ability to speak and understand Danish or English
ğŸŒ Capability to work independently as well as part of an engaged and environmentally conscious team

Are you ready to take the next step in your career and become part of our sustainable and passionate team? ğŸŒ± Then send your application and CV to job@helinhair.dk as soon as possible.

If you have any questions about the position, feel free to contact Charlotte Hein Pedersen at +45 21990202.
